name: Granny Sandy and the Mobility Scooter of Doom
name_original: Granny Sandy and the Mobility Scooter of Doom
description:
Aliens are invading and you only have your trusty mobility scooter to defend yourself! Mow down the extra-terrestrials, but watch out! If you hit a curb, you might lose your glasses and have to deal with being near-sighted!

Controls: WASD
